lead_paragraph: Ahmet Davutoglu slipped into Syria on Sunday to visit an ancient tomb that was relocated this year away from jihadist-controlled territory.

headline.print_headline: Turkey: Prime Minister Visits Ottoman Tomb in Syria
headline.main: Turkey: Prime Minister Visits Ottoman Tomb in Syria

snippet: Ahmet Davutoglu slipped into Syria on Sunday to visit an ancient tomb that was relocated this year away from jihadist-controlled territory.
abstract: Turkish Prime Min Ahmet Davutoglu makes secret visit to Syrian tomb of Suleyman Shah, monument revered by Turks; Turkish soldiers moved tomb away from jihadist territory and close to Turkish border in February 2015, drawing criticism from opposition members.
